content:
Definition of State

Definition of State

  • The state of an object encompasses all of the (usually static) properties of the object plus the current (usually dynamic) values of each of these properties
  • Hadar
    • Talking, Pacing, Smiling, Hungry, Tired
  • Peyman
    • Sitting, Listening, Typing, Hungry, Tired, Bored
  • My Bank Account
    • #123456, Checking, Open/Active, Overdrawn, Balance -1234.56
  • My Car
    • Jeep, Cherokee, 1992, White, 5-speed, paid-for, Stalled
